page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area is made up of parts of 5 of the 12{parishes}of Jersey:St.Saviour, St.Helier, St.Martin, Grouville and Trinity. In the South West corner lies part of the outskirts of the main town of St.Helier. The remainder is mainly rural consisting of farmland, woodland and one modern housing estate. There are several{valleys,}the two major ones being Grands Vaux which contains a reservior and Queens valley which is the proposed site of a new water development. Water is of major importance in the Island. St.Louis{observatory}is within the square & climatic readings are taken daily. Average January temperatures are 6.0 Celsius & July temperatures are 17.1 Celsius with a total annual rainfall of 862.9mm. The average annual sunshine total is 1898.5 hrs.
